summary: At their own discretion, defense contractors can conduct research and development projects of potential interest to DOD and may be reimbursed for some or all of this work. This kind of independent research and development in high-tech areas can help the U.S. military keep a technological edge. We found that DOD does not review how contractors' independent R&D projects fit into the department's modernization priorities...
title: Defense Science and Technology: Opportunities to Better Integrate Industry Independent Research and Development into DOD Planning
